001package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
005
006import java.io.StringReader;
007import java.io.StringWriter;
008import java.util.Collection;
009
010import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
011import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
012import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.hasSize;
013
014public class TextDumperParserTest {
015
016  private Airline dumpAndParse(Airline airline) throws ParserException {
017    StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
018    TextDumper dumper = new TextDumper(sw);
019    dumper.dump(airline);
020
021    String text = sw.toString();
022
023    TextParser parser = new TextParser(new StringReader(text));
024    return parser.parse();
025  }
026
027  @Test
028  void dumpedTextCanBeParsed() throws ParserException {
029    String airlineName = "Airline Name";
030    int flightNumber = 456;
031
032    Airline airline = new Airline(airlineName);
033    airline.addFlight(new Flight(flightNumber));
034
035    Airline airline2 = dumpAndParse(airline);
036    assertThat(airline2.getName(), equalTo(airlineName));
037    Collection<Flight> flights = airline2.getFlights();
038    assertThat(flights, hasSize(1));
039    Flight flight = flights.iterator().next();
040    assertThat(flight.getNumber(), equalTo(flightNumber));
041  }
042}
